Title: Two piece Short Sleeves Evening Dress

----

Sku: 11032

Colors: black

Category: evening

Featured-image: 11032-black-two-piece-short-sleeves-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Elegant two piece with a short sleeved bodice. The top is beaded and sequined with intricate designs. The short sleeves are sheer with sequins adding sparkle. The trim of the midriff is beaded as well and the chiffon skirt falls to the floor and flows into a court train.
